00005 #include <stdio.h>
00006 #include <bpm/bpm_messages.h>
00007 #include <bpm/bpm_nr.h>

00019 double nr_rangauss( double mean, double std_dev ) {
00020 
00021   static int iset = 0;
00022   static double gset;
00023   double fac, rsq, v1, v2;
00024   double val = -DBL_MAX;
00025 
00026   if ( iset == 0 ) {
00027     do {
00028       v1 = 2.0*nr_ran1( &bpm_rseed ) - 1.0;
00029       v2 = 2.0*nr_ran1( &bpm_rseed ) - 1.0;
00030       rsq = v1 * v1 + v2 * v2;
00031     } while (rsq >= 1.0 || rsq == 0 );
00032 
00033     fac = sqrt(-2.0 * log(rsq) / rsq);
00034     gset = v1 * fac;
00035     iset = 1;
00036     val = (v2*fac * std_dev) + mean;
00037   } else  {
00038     iset = 0;
00039     val = (gset * std_dev) + mean;
00040   }
00041 
00042   return val;
00043 }
